name: The Interview (itch) (Meligos)
description:
You've got a mysterious email. It's stated you've been invited to a job interview in the biggest corporation in the world... yet you didn't even apply. Will you take this chance of a lifetime — the choice is yours!

Authors:

Alex Churakov – Game Writer and Creative Director.

Konstantin Kitmanov – Game Writer and Technical Consultant.

Vyacheslav Krokhmal – Game Artist (Reception location, Stanley character in reception location, Elizabeth character).

Little Witch – Game Artist (Stanley flat location, Stanley character original design).

Pavel Filipovich – Game Artist (Characters portraits).

Victor Likhodkin – Game Composer.
